[ON-SCREEN: YOU: COLD CALLS vs THEM: DATA MINING] Every listing in your MLS has 300 data fields â€” days on market, price per square foot, seller concessions, seasonal patterns. You're looking at photos and square footage. They're seeing predictive patterns. [ON-SCREEN: 300 DATA FIELDS PER LISTING]

INSIGHT: "Imagine if NAR committed to being 10x data collection, insights and analysis. We could do 100x with AI." [ON-SCREEN: 10X DATA = 100X RESULTS] But here's the thing â€” you don't need to wait for NAR. The data's already there. ChatGPT can analyze your entire market in seconds. While most agents wing it with gut feelings, top producers walk into every appointment with market intelligence that makes them look prophetic.

CTA: "Are you analyzing your market data or just winging it?"
